title: Escarola
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, International, Juice bar, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Serves mainly vegetarian food with many vegan choices. Menu items are tacos, quesadillas, pasta, soups, baguettes, burgers and more, some of which are vegan. Fresh fruit and veggie juices available. A natural open space in the heart of the city that promotes a sustainable lifestyle.
